properties.title: d13C(CH4) isotopic signatures
properties.history: Sub-sectors aggregated into sectors (flux-weighted). NaN values filled with flux-weighted global mean.
properties.fluxes_source_for_flux_weighted: AGRICULTURAL_WASTE, BIOFUELS, BIOMASS, COAL, LANDFILLS, LIVESTOCK, OILGASIND, RICE, WASTE_WATER: EDGARv8 (Crippa et al. 2023), GEOLOGICAL, OCEANIC, TERMITES, WETLAND: Prior fluxes provided with the Global Methane budget inversion protocol (Martinez et al. 2024)
properties.signature_source: LIVESTOCK, BIOFUELS, BIOMASS: LAN ET. AL (2021), WASTE_WATER, LANDFILLS, AGRICULTURAL_WASTE, RICE: MENOUD ET AL. (2022), COAL, OILGASIND: LAN ET. AL (2021), MENOUD ET AL. (2022), WETLAND: OH ET AL. (2022), OCEANIC: SANSONE ET AL. (2001), TERMITES: THOMPSON ET AL. (2018), GEOLOGICAL: ETIOPE ET AL. (2019)

sign_d13c_agw.description: Monthly flux-weighted d13C(CH4) isotopic signature for agricultural and waste

attrs.long_name: Monthly flux-weighted d13C(CH4) isotopic signature for agricultural and waste
attrs.sigma_agg_description: Aggregation uncertainty σagg (‰) representing variability introduced when aggregating sub-sector signatures into sector-level values using flux weights
attrs.sigma_prop_max_description: Upper bound of propagated uncertainty σprop from sub-sector isotopic composition (‰) based on literature standard deviations
attrs.sigma_prop_min_description: Lower bound of propagated uncertainty σprop from sub-sector isotopic composition (‰) based on Monte Carlo estimates
attrs.sigma_total_max_description: Upper bound of total uncertainty σtotal (‰) computed as sqrt(σprop^2 + σagg^2)
attrs.sigma_total_min_description: Lower bound of total uncertainty σtotal (‰) computed as sqrt(σprop^2 + σagg^2)

sign_d13c_sub_sector_agricultural_waste.description: Monthly δ13C(CH4) isotopic signature for agricultural waste

attrs.long_name: Monthly δ13C(CH4) isotopic signature for agricultural waste
attrs.std_i_lan_comment: Uncertainty values derived from 10,000 Monte Carlo simulations at the grid-cell level explicitly propagating measurement and modeling errors through source attribution and mixing processes
attrs.std_i_lan_long_name: Isotopic uncertainty σi for each sub-sector from Lan et al. (2021)
attrs.std_i_menoud_comment: Standard deviations of δ13C-CH4 values reported in the literature capturing spatial variability and methodological dispersion
attrs.std_i_menoud_long_name: Isotopic uncertainty σi for each sub-sector from Menoud et al. (2022)
